properties.name: inputVideoUseFilePath
properties.description: Toggle to use a direct file path for the input video. Uncheck to use binary data from a previous node.

properties.name: inputVideoFilePath
properties.description: The absolute path to the video file on the system running n8n.

properties.name: inputVideoBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property on the input item containing the video data.

properties.name: ffmpegThreshold
properties.description: The sensitivity of FFmpeg's scene detector (0.0 to 1.0). Lower values are more sensitive and will find more cuts. Default is 0.4.

properties.name: minSceneDuration
properties.description: Automatically ignore any detected scenes shorter than this duration in seconds. Helps remove flashes and glitches.
